services.name: Suitable Fishing Areas
services.mail_body: I am interested in receiving a free trial for daily forecast bulletins by the suitable fishing areas service. I hereby share my contact information for the FORCOAST service manager to get in touch and discuss possibilities.%0A%0AName:%0AOrganisation:%0AIntended use:%0ALocation of interest (coordinates):%0A%0ABest regards,
services.description: The Suitable Fishing Areas service offers information about the most likely areas to find the fish species of choice.

services.name: Fronts detection
services.mail_body: I am interested in receiving a free trial for daily forecast bulletins by the Front detection service. I hereby share my contact information for the FORCOAST service manager to get in touch and discuss possibilities.%0A%0AName:%0AOrganisation:%0AIntended use:%0ALocation of interest (coordinates):%0A%0ABest regards,
services.description: Providing maps of frontal areas, based on sea surface temperature and chlorophyll a concentrations, to identify suitable habitat for small pelagic fish. This information enables the fishermen to increase catches, reduce unwanted bycatch and to save fuel.
